title: Financial Literacy For All
description: Financial illiteracy is a major issue across the world. Cardano needs a platform where users can easily discuss, learn, earn, save & invest.

f6_assessments.q0:
The proposal highlighted a problem and proposed a good solution but the proposal lacks implementation plan, timeline with cost breakdown and milestones.
The proposal needs more details.
I can neither agree nor disagree.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposal provided verifiable link of experience but failed to provide a detailed implementation plan with cost breakdown.
f6_assessments.q2:
The proposal did not provide sufficient information to audit progress and success of the proposal.
I disagree

solution: Hybrid fintech & social platform serving & connecting those who want to improve their financial situation & learn about financial concepts.
experience:
Avocado: Social Investing. iOS & Android. Available Now.  

MVP official launch date: 9/9/21  

Ruby On Rails. React(JS). JavaScript. HTML. CSS.
